name: The Dwarven Brigade
description:
Dwarfs use pylons to navigate the mineshaft; the green pylon allows them to see ores.

Clearing: You should dig tunnels in straight lines as it will be cheaper digging them diagonally. 

Normal Pylon: Dwarfs will follow the beams to other pylons. Pylons can only fire in 4 direction.

Scanner Pylon: Dwarfs will mine any ore they can access. Pylons can only fire in 4 direction.

Stockpile: Used as a drop off point for dwarfs, this will make it easier to get farther down.

Forge: Dwarfs can't clear all terrain at the start, the forge allows them to do so.

____________________________________

Known Bugs

Minor

Dwarfs will sometimes randomly walk through walls. This is caused by them seeing a pylon through walls as there is no code to stop this.

if two dwarfs are clearing the same tile, the second to reach the tile will be forever stuck in place. This usually only happens if you are connecting tunnels together.

Major

The Destruction button is a bit glitchy right now, if you try to destroy something while a beam is fired at it. The game will crash. Also if a dwarf is walking to a pylon when you destroy it, they will wander off into the abyss.
